text: Gloria Jharna Sarkar is a Bangladeshi politician and lawyer who is elected as Member of 11th Jatiya Sangsad of Reserved Seats for Women. She is a politician of Bangladesh Awami League. She is the first Christian Women MP of Bangladesh. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Awami League politicians Category:People from Khulna District Category:11th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Women members of the Jatiya Sangsad Category:Bangladeshi lawyers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Gloria Jharna Sarker
